title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: One thing for sure where is the attention it's always the smoke and mirror not always but often.We Are on the war energy Crisis economic chaos and a lot economy and financial problems.Now you can't trust what you see on the news you only get half If the info but when u travel around the world you talk with people u see how the things Are.No question that there is now world war 3 i spoken with one smart person he told Europe should be Alert becouse Europe dont stand so strong together.NATO not all trusted some people tell one thing but they will Act different And most interesting IS that crypto is involved a lot things in the world something IS going on and comes by surprise But we know our leaders never tell truth so after will be just too Late to find out. Things looking bad everything...
